name: Paris
description: The City of Light captivates with its iconic landmarks, world-class museums, and romantic atmosphere. From the Eiffel Tower to the Louvre, Paris offers an unparalleled cultural experience.

budget.details: Mid-range accommodation and dining

name: Tokyo
description: A vibrant metropolis where ancient traditions blend seamlessly with cutting-edge technology. Tokyo offers incredible cuisine, shopping, and cultural experiences.

budget.details: Includes meals and local transport

name: Santorini
description: A stunning volcanic island famous for its dramatic cliffs, beautiful beaches, and spectacular sunsets. The perfect romantic getaway destination.

budget.details: Luxury island accommodation

name: Reykjavik
description: The northernmost capital in the world, offering stunning natural phenomena like the Northern Lights, geysers, and dramatic volcanic landscapes.

budget.details: High cost of living destination

name: Kyoto
description: The cultural heart of Japan, known for its countless classical Buddhist temples, serene gardens, imperial palaces, and traditional geisha districts.

budget.details: Affordable ryokans and street food available

name: New York City
description: The bustling metropolis that never sleeps, famous for its iconic skyline, Broadway shows, world-class museums, and diverse neighborhoods.
thingsToDo: Tour the Metropolitan Museum of Art

budget.details: Expensive city with high accommodation costs

name: Sydney
description: A vibrant harbor city known for its stunning Opera House, beautiful beaches like Bondi, and laid-back outdoor lifestyle.

budget.details: Moderate to high cost, especially for waterfront dining

name: Rome
description: The Eternal City, a sprawling open-air museum boasting millennia of history, from the ancient Colosseum to the Vatican City.
thingsToDo: Throw a coin in Trevi Fountain

budget.details: Good value for food and sightseeing

name: Cape Town
description: A stunning coastal city nestled between the iconic Table Mountain and the Atlantic Ocean, offering incredible natural beauty and wildlife.

budget.details: Excellent value for money, favorable exchange rate

name: Rio de Janeiro
description: The Marvelous City is famous for its breathtaking landscape, vibrant Carnival festival, samba music, and iconic beaches like Copacabana and Ipanema.
thingsToDo: Ride the cable car to Sugarloaf Mountain

budget.details: Affordable for food and activities

name: Bangkok
description: A bustling capital known for its ornate shrines, vibrant street life, chaotic markets, and some of the world's best street food.
thingsToDo: Take a riverboat on the Chao Phraya

budget.details: Extremely affordable for budget travelers

name: Barcelona
description: A vibrant city on the Mediterranean coast, famed for its unique Gaudí architecture, lively tapas bars, and beautiful beaches.

budget.details: Good value, especially for food and wine

name: Dubai
description: A city of superlatives in the desert, home to the world's tallest building, largest shopping malls, and luxurious artificial islands.
thingsToDo: Ski at Mall of the Emirates

budget.details: Luxury destination with high-end options

name: Machu Picchu
description: The legendary lost city of the Incas, an ancient citadel set high in the Andes Mountains, shrouded in mystery and breathtaking beauty.

budget.details: Cost includes guides, permits, and transportation

name: Amsterdam
description: A charming city of picturesque canals, cycling paths, world-class art museums, and historic houses with unique gabled architecture.

budget.details: Moderate cost, bike rentals are affordable

name: Bali
description: The Island of the Gods, famous for its volcanic mountains, iconic rice paddies, beaches, and coral reefs, alongside a deeply spiritual culture.

budget.details: Very affordable for luxury villas and food

name: Prague
description: The City of a Hundred Spires, a stunningly preserved medieval core with a fairy-tale castle, charming squares, and the historic Charles Bridge.

budget.details: One of Europe's most affordable capitals

name: Banff National Park
description: Canada's first national park, located in the heart of the Rocky Mountains, offering stunning turquoise lakes, glaciers, and dramatic peaks.
thingsToDo: Relax in Banff Upper Hot Springs

budget.details: Costs higher during peak summer season

name: Marrakech
description: A sensory overload in the best way possible, with bustling souks, fragrant spice markets, stunning palaces, and the vibrant Jemaa el-Fnaa square.

budget.details: Great value for unique accommodations (Riads)

name: Queenstown
description: The adventure capital of the world, set against the dramatic backdrop of the Remarkables mountain range on the shores of Lake Wakatipu.

budget.details: Adventure activities can be expensive

name: Venice
description: A unique floating city built on over 100 small islands, crisscrossed by canals and connected by beautiful bridges, with no roads for cars.
thingsToDo: Visit the islands of Murano and Burano

budget.details: Can be expensive, especially near main sights

name: Singapore
description: A modern city-state and global hub known for its multiculturalism, futuristic gardens, efficient infrastructure, and world-class street food.

budget.details: High-end shopping and hotels, affordable food

name: Petra
description: The legendary Rose-Red City, an ancient Nabataean capital carved directly into the vibrant red sandstone cliffs, lost to the world for centuries.
thingsToDo: Walk through the Siq to the Treasury
Visit the High Place of Sacrifice

budget.details: Jordan Pass offers good value for multiple sites

name: Istanbul
description: A transcontinental city bridging Europe and Asia, rich with history from the Byzantine and Ottoman empires, famous for its grand bazaars and majestic mosques.
thingsToDo: Get lost in the Grand Bazaar

budget.details: Excellent value for history and cuisine

name: Mount Roraima
description: A mystical tabletop mountain that inspired Arthur Conan Doyle's 'The Lost World', featuring unique endemic species and breathtaking cloud-covered landscapes.

budget.details: Guided trek required, includes equipment and meals

name: Pamukkale
description: The 'Cotton Castle' - stunning white travertine terraces formed by mineral-rich thermal waters, with ancient Hierapolis ruins overlooking the surreal landscape.

budget.details: Affordable accommodation in nearby towns

name: Giant's Causeway
description: An incredible geological formation of about 40,000 interlocking basalt columns, the result of an ancient volcanic fissure eruption and subject of Irish legends.

budget.details: Moderate costs, rental car recommended

name: Socotra Island
description: The 'Galapagos of the Indian Ocean' - an isolated island with otherworldly landscapes and unique flora and fauna found nowhere else on Earth.

budget.details: Basic facilities, guided tours essential

name: Moraine Lake
description: A glacially-fed lake in the Valley of the Ten Peaks, renowned for its stunning turquoise-blue waters set against dramatic mountain scenery.

budget.details: Park entry fees apply, limited accommodation

name: Fly Geyser
description: An accidental man-made geyser created by well drilling in the 1960s, now creating a constantly growing multicolored mound of mineral deposits.

budget.details: Tours required as it's on private property

name: Reed Flute Cave
description: A natural limestone cave with spectacular multicolored lighting illuminating magnificent stalactites, stalagmites, and rock formations.

budget.details: Very affordable entry and local costs

name: Lake Hillier
description: A stunning pink lake on Middle Island with bubblegum-colored water that remains permanently pink, caused by microorganisms and high salinity.

budget.details: Scenic flights are main expense
